thread.title: Tottenham manager Mauricio Pochettino admits they must improve away record against top-six rivals if they want to close on Chelsea
thread.title_full: Tottenham manager Mauricio Pochettino admits they must improve away record against top-six rivals if they want to close on Chelsea

author: ituckey
title: Tottenham manager Mauricio Pochettino admits they must improve away record against top-six rivals if they want to close on Chelsea
text:
EFL TRAVEL SIXNESS Tottenham manager Mauricio Pochettino admits they must improve away record against top-six rivals if they want to close on Chelsea 
Spurs chief feels trip to Liverpool is the ideal chance to boost record of one victory from 14 trips to top clubs since he arrived By PAUL JIGGINS
